name: Obstacle Boost
description:
Controls: Space to thrust upwards. A and D to control directions. 

How to play: Maneuver through the level to reach the bright green Landing Pad. Don't touch any other object. Losing causes you to go back to the first level.

This game was made following the course Learn C# Code by Making Games - Complete Unity Developer 2.0, taught by professor Ben Tristam, in the Udemy course platform.(Link:https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse2/learn/v4/content).

View source code:  https://github.com/SaloXtreme/Obstacle-Boost/blob/master/Rocket.cs
